2092490.name: Visual Novel Maker - Japanese School Girls - The Music of Their Stories
2092490.description:
Let this music pack help you tell your story through the magical world view of Japanese School girls and their interesting culture

Features:

* 30 BGM and 20 ME
* ogg and m4a file formats included

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in Visual Novel Maker or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
2092490.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文
